agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Health & Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 12, 2019 PLACE: Senate Chamber CHAIR: Senator Lois Kolkhorst The committee will organize, adopt rules, and consider the following: SB 10 Nelson | et al. Relating to the creation of the Texas Mental Health Care Consortium. Individuals wishing to provide public testimony will be allowed to speak for 3 minutes total on the bill listed above. If submitting written testimony, please provide 20 copies to the committee. The committee will also hear invited testimony from the following state agencies/officials: State Demographer Health and Human Services Commission Department of State Health Services Department of Family and Protective Services
